sentences.sContent: Turkey plans to harness the waters of the Tigris and Euphrates rivers for big hydro-electric power projects.
sentences.sCn: 土耳其计划利用底格里斯河与幼发拉底河的水来建造大型水力发电工程。

synos.tran: 马具；甲胄；挽具状带子；降落伞背带

phrases.pCn: 一起合作；在日常工作中
安全带；安全吊带；安全挂钩具

trans.tranOther: If you harness something such as an emotion or natural source of energy, you bring it under your control and use it
